p: There are well‐established rodent malaria models such as Plasmodium berghei ANKA (PbA) and P. yoelii 17X (Py17x). In the lethal experimental cerebral malaria (ECM) 93, 94, 95 model, PbA‐infected animals succumb during the first week postinfection due to neurological complications. The P. yoelii 17X (Py17x) mouse model is a non‐lethal, self‐resolving infection used in studies of acquired immunity against the parasite. 96 These experimental models would be ideal to study co‐infections with CHIKV.
